@graph.headline: Optizen App Shopify SEO
@graph.description: OptizenAI – Not your everyday Shopify SEO app! Optizen was created to fill a gap with Shopify SEO………by creating the ability to create true sub collections, and silo structures with collections, by allowing you the ability to edit the meta information of sub collection pages! Now with the extra power of AI, update products and […]
@graph.keywords: Shopify SEO, Optizen AI, sub collections, tag pages, AI content updates, silo structures, meta optimization, collection pages, variant tagger, internal linking

about.name: Optizen AI
about.description: Shopify SEO app that allows creation of sub collections and silo structures with AI-powered content updates

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen AI has 5 main features: 1) Updates products with AI at scale including SEO titles, descriptions, H1 titles, product descriptions, and internal linking, 2) Adds content to collection pages and allows editing of tag pages, 3) Exports & imports collection and tag pages via CSV, 4) Provides smart tag filters for internal linking, 5) Includes variant tagger and image thumbnail matcher features

@graph.name: Silo Structures
@graph.description: Well-structured content categorization that search engines prefer for organizing relevant content

@graph.name: Tag Pages
@graph.description: Sub collection pages in Shopify that can be optimized for SEO with custom titles, descriptions, and content

@graph.name: Variant Tagger
@graph.description: Feature that automatically adds product variants as tags with a single click

@graph.name: Smart Tag Filters
@graph.description: Sidebar filters added to collections for improved internal linking and user experience
